MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL14 postcode area of Rhos, affecting properties in Market Street, Cynlas Street, King Street and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:20 am. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 10:15 am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 7:17 am on 23rd December, 2020.
